website_summaries.verdict: This gel-infused mattress delivers pressure-relieving support to help you get the Zzz's you need night after night.
pros: Equipped with a gel memory foam layer that guarantees you can sleep at a comfortable temperature at all times
Features a ViscoLatex layer that provides additional comfort
Includes iCoil springs that will help you minimize motion transfer so you can enjoy uninterrupted rest

customer_reviews.title: Not what they promise.
customer_reviews.text: First, Amazon was great! Worked with us wonderfully. The mattress was date stamped 9-12-17. We received it December 18-2018. Ummm. That may be why it never expanded. It was very lumpy, over 4 inches short in length for a cal king. Width was right. Still looked Pringled after 4 days. We tried heating it to help, didn’t help. We tried pulling it to help stretch it out. Didn’t help. We bought the 14 inch hybrid. It got close to 12 inches thick in some areas. Closer to 10.5 in others. No place near 14. Maybe, just maybe if it hadn’t sat for 15 months rolled up tight, maybe it would have been better???
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Happy Momma!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the King size and am very happy with it. It's not too soft and not too firm. It has good support at the edges due to the encased coil springs. It has only been a week but my backache was reduced after the first night and is now gone. Can't say how pleased I am.
customer_reviews.author: C. Shade

customer_reviews.title: Sleeps firm but not too firm - both of us are side sleepers and have had no trouble getting comfortable - and the gel infusion really seems to cool ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely impressed with this bed, considering the low price! Sleeps firm but not too firm - both of us are side sleepers and have had no trouble getting comfortable - and the gel infusion really seems to cool here in Florida. Great value, and a month in is holding up wonderfully. Even if it starts to sag in a year or two, it's worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Young

customer_reviews.title: Goldilocks says This Mattress Is Too Firm
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is firm: 12” hybrid. Little to no “give” when lying on it (I’m 5’8” and about 155 lbs). It has good edge support —mattress does not sink under weight—but I’ve woken with a sore hip all week (side sleeping). Also, do not plan on setting it up yourself if you can’t lift 100 lbs. I noticed a slight smell, but it wasn’t bad and was gone in about a day. The mattress came well wrapped, opened fine and expanded to the advertised size in less than a day. I simply can’t sleep on it...way too hard for me.
customer_reviews.author: welikemeatloaf

customer_reviews.title: Heaven in a box!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed. I have had it a month already and I have a bad back and sciatica. This mattress has given me a peaceful month of sleep. I wake up to no pains, no morning stiffness and I don't toss n' turn anymore. I fall asleep fast. It is by far the best bed I have ever had. Extremely fast shipping and the delivery guys brought it right to my room. The smell is not bad at all. Some people claims the mattress gave a really strong smell but there was no smell when I opened mine. This bed is firm and forms to your body. It is very soft and just well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn L. Harwood

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Firm as heck and bad for side-sleepers like my wife and I. Worse, the whole bed shakes something awful with every movement, something we really really miss about our old all-foam mattress which didn’t shake at all when your partner moved at night. We tried to like this, but now we are stuck with it past the return window. Going to have to invest in a memory foam topper and hope for the best, but we shouldn’t have to. Really regret this “hybrid.” It is really just a stiff traditional mattress. Also weighs a bazillion pounds.
customer_reviews.author: David Hays

customer_reviews.title: Beware 2 mattresses both failed.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really comfortable mattress but, after a month of sleeping on it the mattress started to fail in a few places there are now 1 inch and 3 inch depressions in the mattress. So far the company has been pretty good about listening to me but they're not replaced it yet I will update this as they do so.. Update: Got the new mattress and before it was even slept on, it failed. They look good coming out of the package but once you give them time (72 hours) to get their shape they immediately fail. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Patton

customer_reviews.title: How annoying and INCONVENIENT!
customer_reviews.text: PISSED!!! So while the mattress seems like it might be fine, I was sent a TWIN and NOT THE FULL that I ORDERED!!!! Would be no big deal if it was easy to repack but it’s NOT! Bought this for my guest room now I have to lug it back down the stairs and find a way to get it back! Soooooo annoyed...and hot...and sweaty right now! 🤬🙄
customer_reviews.author: Tyisha

customer_reviews.title: Rock Hard
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love it because it’s a beautiful bed but it’s way to firm and stiff. I’ve had it for 3 nights and my back and sides are killing me from how hard this bed is. I wanted a bed that had some firmness to it but this is too much. I gave it it’s allotted time to “inflate” and it was 12 inches in less than 24 hrs but I still waited to lay on it. The smell was gone after the first night but again I can’t get past how uncomfortable it is. I’m returning for free ups pick up but idk how I’m going to package it.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed - yet hopeful!
customer_reviews.text: We previously bought this mattress in a Queen and LOVE it, but we decided to move up to a King, so purchased the exact same. But when it arrived, and we let it expand for about 36 hours, it was ridiculous! There are deep trenches at 1/3 and 2/3 down the bed where it had been folded, and it was like sleeping on mashed potatoes. I immediately requested a replacement due to this one being defective, and received confirmation right away. They say the delivery people will take the bad one when they bring the new one. Please, please, please be a good one this time!!
customer_reviews.author: Joan R.

customer_reviews.title: made house uninhabitable
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased a few foam mattresses. They all smell a bit as they off gas after being opened. This one had been open for four days now and is still making the house uninhabitable. we tried leaving a high flow fan in the room for three days to no avail. Amazon was very helpful for the return. But I still have to dispose of a brand new mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Keegan Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mattress for 1 to 2 months. First wk was good, I was happy however we are already getting indentations in the mattress and the firmness is giving out already. Waste of money unfortunately
customer_reviews.author: sheila

customer_reviews.title: It's a bed
customer_reviews.text: From the way these beds are advertised you'd think they were life changing or whatever but it's just a bed. It seems pretty in the middle as far as firmness goes. I will say I have back problems specifically when I wake up in the AM and this bed hasn't helped at all. It is pretty comfy though and my partner likes it. Also, I can still smell the SMELL on my pillow and sheets sometimes even after months. Its not super strong anymore but it's there- so if you're very sensitive to smells I would not reccomend. All in all I think it's a decent bed and the price point is great.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi RayTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Best deal on a good quality mattress!
customer_reviews.text: Zinus 14 Inch Gel-Infused Memory Foam Hybrid Mattress, Queen-My wife and I have had this "bed-in-a-box" for almost 1 1/2 years now. It has been one of our best purchases ever made on Amazon. It seems of quality materials and a good price. We slept well from the 1st night. One could pay $1000 -$2000 more and I've seen them. I would not hesitate to recommend this mattress to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Ekim

customer_reviews.title: Sleep Good
customer_reviews.text: Its hard for me to rate this good or bad but that I seem to sleep like a baby on this. I was so used to my old mattress that was 17 years old with a topper on it. My hips started to hurt and needed the support. After sleeping on this new mattress it was a little more firmer than I thought and just wasn't sure about it. After sleeping on it for a week and getting used to it I have had no issues with my hips and doing well with it. Just have to give it a chance especially if your used to a pretty plush feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Heather H.

customer_reviews.title: Supportive plush bed
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 14” because it was supposed to be the most plush. Let me start by saying I’m not even 115 pounds and I do not find it firm like a lot of other people have. It does form to your body, and is great for side sleepers! This is not a plush, sleeping on pillows type bed, it’s a supportive plush bed.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Seabury

customer_reviews.title: Very VERY firm- painfully so
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed because I had read that the hybrid is a softer bed and that it would have some plush give to it. I woke up feeling like I had been beaten all night long with a club. The mattress seems to be a very good quality and is well constructed, no odors when we unpacked it, regained its shape very quickly after unpacking, and it is pretty. It is extremely hard and hurts my hips (I am a side sleeper) and laying on my back it causes my lower back to hurt, but I have back problems. I’m sure this is a very nice mattress if you are a person looking for a very firm mattress.
customer_reviews.author: kels64

customer_reviews.title: This bed is dangerous!
customer_reviews.text: For the record, I LOVE this bed. It's very supportive, yet not "grabby" like a lot of memory foam mattresses can be. The price was very reasonable, and delivery was prompt. Now, for my warning. PAY ATTENTION TO THE INSTRUCTIONS! Have someone responsible help you unpackage it. They're not kidding. This mattress will kick your ass seven ways from Sunday, if you aren't careful. When it pops open, there is no stopping it, and you better not be in the way. That said, it truly is one of the most comfortable mattresses I've ever slept on. It's stout, too. There's nothing flimsy or shoddy about it. 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam N. Paschal

customer_reviews.title: Bad edge support
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is probably fine if your nightstands are tall enough and you sleep in the middle. I was impressed with the design and it's got nice layers of foam on top. Unfortunately I sleep on the edge of the bed and that wasn't possible with this mattress as the edge support sucks and I tended to roll off. I have another 12" Zinus foam-only mattress that my youngest kids use and I think it's the MOST comfortable bed in the house! It was also a lot cheaper than this hybrid one. I think the edge support on theirs wouldn't be great either but nobody sleeps on the edge of that one anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse A. Safir

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: My bed frame is for CA King bed so I had to buy the same size. Little did I know that a regular mattress is a lot bigger than memory gel mattress. The box said it was CA King but..... It is what it is I suppose. It's very comfy don't get me wrong but now I've got big gaps on both sides. I should've just bought the bed from an actual bed store like we had planned but..... Was trying to save money
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Johnson

customer_reviews.title: This is the best bed I’ve ever bought.
customer_reviews.text: I waited three months to write this review. This was my 4th mattress in 5 years. I have neck and lower back issues and getting a good nights sleep has been almost impossible. I thought that the more $$ I spent the better the quality until I was $7k in and still not sleeping. I looked at every mattress available and I ended with this mattress. Bought it and crossed my fingers. I LOVE THIS BED!! It’s a life changer. I sleep all night and wake up without any aching or stiffness. This is a game changer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolute junk! Stiff as a board & impossible to haul
customer_reviews.text: Absolute junk! Left to rise 48 hours as required... Impossible to haul! 3 out of 4 straps broke with in 5 minutes! Unbelievably stiff! 1/2 of give if that!! Smells awful! Looks great. That's it. Not impressed! Zero way to return. Out of a 1-10 one being the stiffest. I would rate this thing a 3. Movement transfer is the only thing is good at. Now... How the heck do I get my money back when it's impossible to return?! Will be looking into that tomorrow!
customer_reviews.author: Shear Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Packaging & Unboxing & Sleep
customer_reviews.text: The box arrived damaged and ripped. Luckily the heavy duty plastic preserved the mattress. Unwrapping the mattress lacked the cutting tool. I used a box cutter. The mattress was opened on Saturday evening and slept on it Monday evening. You can feel the coils all around the mattress side of straps. First impression mattress is very firm. Let's see as time goes on. Will update review in 15 days. Updated; sleeping great. The mattress holds up for someone weighing 290. Great support on the back. Remember to upgrade on pillows. Have a great night sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Coretto

customer_reviews.title: Too firm for me. Also doesn't look as nice as the picture.
customer_reviews.text: The top portion (pillow top area) isn't flush with the rest of the mattress like it is in the pictures. It looks cheaper in person. But the real reason this mattress went back was because it was too firm. I was told the 14" was the least firm of all the Zinus mattresses. If that's true, Zinus is out for us. I admit we like out mattresses soft, but this is medium firmness at best.
customer_reviews.author: Hey Hey Trojan

customer_reviews.title: Off to a good start
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised when they brought it in, all rolled up. I knew it was a hybrid, so how can it be rolled? I looked closer and saw the small rings at the bottom side, lots and lots of little springs. The weight on it is substantial, the thickness of the pillow too is luxurious. It is very comparable to a Sealy I bought from fortunoff that cost an arm and a leg a decade ago. Which I let BJ haul off last week, after buying the worst mattress in the works from then, which was also a “sealy”. Yesterday was my first night, hopping my back Pain resolves, my only issue was a bad Mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie F

customer_reviews.title: Best $400 I've spent.
customer_reviews.text: I hoped that this mattress was going to be an amazing product but for $400, I had my doubts. Let me tell you though... this is amazingly comfortable. I have chronic back pain so I tend to struggle with mattresses, especially ones that are more on the firm side. Memory foam is also usually a no no for me. I'm so happy that I took the chance on this. I've had two wonderful nights of sleep as well as a few naps that I snuck in and I have zero pain caused by sleeping. The mattress also had no odor which was a bonus. I'll update the review if anything changes but for now, I'm one happy sleeper.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Littlefield

customer_reviews.title: I like it. After a year, still wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: Waited a year to write this. This mattress is as comfortable, or more than my $4000 Tempur-Pedic. If it only lasts half as long, I'm WAY ahead. And actually, I prefer it. I got the 14 inch, and it does get a little warm for afternoon naps, but in the Winter, it is my favorite place.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Larson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: We've bought the King size, 12" hybrid. You cannot find anything that gets close to this quality/price ratio! The mattress is as we expected it: firm but comfortable. It comes in a big package that is not easy to move around (due to the shape and size). It fully expanded in a couple of hours, no odors (we read some in other reviews) and... well it's just as good as we wished it to be. For double the price you will hardly find something this good.
customer_reviews.author: Dario

customer_reviews.title: Firm, Soft, Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This is firm which is great for me since I have back issues. It's a comfortable firm yet softness to the bed. I am able to sleep through the night without waking up with back pain and it's most appreciated. No smell after the bed has risen to shape (took two days) no weird or odd smells from the factory.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Kilner

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for my son two years ago and it has held up well to my big boy. We just upgraded his bed from a twin to a full and he wanted the same mattress. We ended up buying two. One for our son and one for our daughter. We all like this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: pippi

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking buy this now!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and high keep that in mind. When you do get up there you are immediately held in the palm of its hand gently molding itself to your form, no matter what your form is. No odor. Hysterical instruction on how to set it up. Keeps it shape and feels new even weeks later. well worth the price. FEELS AS GOOD AS A $2000 SAATVA.
customer_reviews.author: Big Foot

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how long we had our last mattress (a memory foam from Costco), but it was getting uncomfortable. Based on the reviews for this, as well as the price, we selected the 12 inch King. Delivery was uneventful, and we unpacked it and let it sit out on the living room floor for 24 hours. Popped it up onto our existing platform, and we’ve been sleeping well ever since. Very comfortable, while still providing firm support. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: meanska

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly firm
customer_reviews.text: I was so scared to buy a mattress online. It’s shopping for one blind. However, this was a perfect choice. It’s a little firmer. Don’t expect to bounce if you jump on it. Personally, I love a firm bed, especially for my back. So, if you’re looking for a springy bed, this probably isn’t the choice. It was so easy to set up, it’s great size, and the handles on the mattress make it easier to transport. Make sure to have some help carrying the mattress into the abode. It’s way heavy. Anyways, good purchase, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Saige

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to all of the positive reviews!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I were apprehensive that a mattress this reasonably priced, that came rolled up in a box, could be as comfy and great as all of the reviews say it is, but the mattress is great... really great! Ours took just about 4-6 hours to expand to the full size, but we didn't sleep on it for 24 hours just in case. Some reviews notice a smell, we did not. I would purchase this mattress over and over, our sleep quality is great and the mattress is just the right balance of firm and comfortable. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: M. Hohn

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Update: I just found I bought 10 inch bed 3 years ago for my son and we both love it. Mine was 12 inch and supposed to be softer but it made body ache. It could be just defective. I really wanted to love it, but before even sleep at night, I found not worth keeping it. The edge has zero support. If you sit down edge, you will slide down. I was about to fall down after sat down edge. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Monster Mom

customer_reviews.title: Maybe buy the 14 if you’re after plush
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my beloved Vivon mattress made by the same company. It was the best mattress I’ve ever owned so I had high hopes for its replacement. Unfortunately the new one doesn’t live up to the old one. The old was 14” and the one I bought was 12”. The new one is a lot firmer then I was expecting. I didn’t think 2inches would make that much of a difference. Overall it’s a fine mattress. Though how I yearn for my old one. Next time I’ll buy the 14”.
customer_reviews.author: Baz

customer_reviews.title: 10 inch
customer_reviews.text: It's a firm but comfy mattress. Some reviews said that 10 inch one is hard like concrete but the one that we received was firm but very comfortable as well. I don't like the sink in feeling of a memory foam mattress which I bought few months ago. We have already called our garbage company to pick it up. Reason why I went for the 10 inch one was because I am not a fan of very thick mattresses because to me they look very odd with modern furniture.
customer_reviews.author: haquekhan1

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is perfect with the exception that it smell horrible. And to top it off Amazon will give you a refund but they will not pick it up. I’m supposed to figure out how to get that very heavy mattress down the stairs and dispose of it !! Really?? customer service has gone out the window!!
customer_reviews.author: Paola Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress for people with back problems
customer_reviews.text: I've had this mattress for almost 2 weeks. I have to say that I was skeptical ordering this. It is very comfortable! I would say that it is just as comfortable as my expensive King Tempurpedic. The only suggestion I have, if you can just let it stand for a week or more without sleeping on it do that. The smell isnt very good. Takes over a week to dissipate and even then you still have that bit of a smell. Smells moldy I know it isnt mold because I am allergic to mold.
customer_reviews.author: maureen

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort, highly affordable and worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the Zinus 12” memory-foam mattress to replace our wornout old dented mattress. So far it has been great! It arrived several days before schedule, delivery driver brought it to the house and helped carry it in. The large box weighed 136lbs. Simple enough to drag into my bedroom. Removed the box, laid the rolled up mattress onto the box spring, and slowly unrolled it. Once unrolled, it began to decompress and we slept on it that very night. It was great! Very good quality and comfort for highly affordable price. Only thing I didn’t like was the initial smell of the factory sealed foam but it’s already dissipated after a couple days. Other than that, it’s good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Boice

customer_reviews.title: Third time was the charm
customer_reviews.text: We had to get 3 of these mattresses delivered. My parents have this same one and it was so comfortable. The first one had the worst smell of wet towels left in the washer that did not go away after weeks. It gave us headaches. Luckily amazon replaced. The second arrived and was much better but the bottom was dirty ND the side had a rip. The third is just perfect finally which is good because it was the last chance. Very comfortable, sprung up perfectly in the end.
customer_reviews.author: N. Leighton

customer_reviews.title: Great Mix of Support and Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using this mattress for 3 nights so far, but I am loving it. I ordered the queen sized 14” and that has been perfect for me so far. It provides great support but is also comfortably soft and cushioning on my painful hip joints and really helps with the arthritis in my back. I was really hesitant to buy this mattress online, but I’m so glad I took the chance and did.
customer_reviews.author: Lori in VA

customer_reviews.title: Misleading reviews
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure why this is so highly rated. I find it exceptionally firm and not at all luxurious. The memory foam section feels thin and I observed zero cooling effect, even compared to my previous 5 year old gel foam mattress. Then again, it is very cheap (+1 star), but I was expecting more given the praise. It's the first mattress I've purchased that I immediately qualified as worse than the one I was replacing...
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Holy cow best kept secret
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for my second home. I needed a solution that did not require renting a truck and transporting them from a box store. They are MORE COMFORTABLE and luxurious than my mattresses at home and cost a fraction of what I spent on the ones from a box store. I was so pleasantly surprised. They weigh about 90 lbs and are delivered rolled up in packaging. Easy to unpack and use and I love them!!
customer_reviews.author: DRW

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mattress for the price
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace a full size mattress in my guest room that everyone complained about but it only gets used maybe five nights a year. I bought this mattress and a frame by Zinus that were perfect. I couldn’t believe how comfortable the mattress is. I even put the frame together by myself so all in all, I am extremely pleased with both purchases and would recommend them both.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia S. Finn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect balance.
customer_reviews.text: Update: have had for 9 months now! Still holding up, even with FOUR kids jumping on it! We LOVE this mattress! Have had this mattress for over 4 months. Wanted to wait to review to give a true test. It is holding up well, and continues to be soooo comfortable. Thick, heavy, firm, yet cradles you with a soft like plushness. Hard to explain. If you want pillow top soft with no support, do not get this. It’s more firm with a soft feel. Perfect blend.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Had issues with shipping, but the quality of the bed is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Our shipping got delayed for what ever reason. We scheduled it for a certain day, and since we assumed it would be delivered that day, we scheduled to donate our old mattress by Salvation Army. They came to pick up our bed and we had no bed for 4 nights. That sucked. However, Amazon, being the amazing company they are, totally took care of the inconvenience! Now to the quality.. AMAZING. We have tried many "name branded" hybrids.. and to be honest, they felt great but costs upwards in the $2500! For the price of this King sized hybrid, I was blown away by how great the quality is. Best purchase I have made in a VERY long time!
customer_reviews.author: Tone

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mattress for guest bed
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mattress for the guest bed. Outside packaging was damaged, but the product was not affected. Getting it upstairs was a two-person job. Mattress plumped up to full shape instantly. No odor detected. Guests were happy.
customer_reviews.author: margo

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, stylish, excellent value. This is my bed!
customer_reviews.text: I just love my bed! I never thought I would be the type of person to buy a bed in a bag but I couldn't resist the price and it was time for a new bed. I gave it a shot and ordered it. I have back problems and so did my husband. He wasn't so much thrilled with it but I was and I feel it's extremely comfortable! I don't have a problem with waking up in pain. I still wake up multiple times a night but that has nothing to do with my back. It's a joy to get into my bed and I absolutely hate leaving it. It's just the most comfortable bed I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie White

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort, high quality.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had my zinus Gel infused Hybrid mattress For a little over a year. I love it. I sleep great on my back and side. I think stomach would be comfortable too. I sink in enough to Take pressure off every pressure point, but can also roll over and get out of the bed easily. There aren’t any dips or sags after over a year of two people sleeping in it. A 130 lb and a 200 lb. It is VERY heavy. I have trouble lifting corners to tuck sheets. But it has nice handles for moving it.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed!!! I have a bad back and it always hurts going to bed trying to relax those first few minutes after lying down. Granted I had an old spring mattress where I could feel the springs on the side of the bed. Anyways I don’t have that pain with this bed!! I lay down and relax so easily and just melt away. I’ve had it for 6 months now and it’s me, hubby, and my 3 year old and it still looks and feels like new haven’t rotated it or anything yet. Love love love...... ok goodnight ❤️
customer_reviews.author: carley

customer_reviews.title: I’m in love!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love! The most comfortable mattress I have ever owned. I was a little nervous about getting it because of the bad reviews about the chemical smell. I’m not sure what anyone is talking about. I opened it in my bedroom put it on the frame and smelled nothing. I was prepared to sleep in a different room for the next couple nights but there was no smell at all. Overall I am very pleased with my purchase. Way better than the $1000 queen sized Casper mattress we have.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H.

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth the price just don’t watch tv in bed, just go to sleep.. doesn’t sink or sag just ripple
customer_reviews.text: I loved it when I first got it, but over time, sitting in bed the top has ripples in it, and I have to try and push it back down, I am looking for a mattress cover that might help, also, those pressure points that it was taking care of are back. I am a side sleeper and my hip knees and shoulders wake me up in dire pain, it stopped when I first got the mattress but is now back in full force. My boyfriend loves the mattress too, thinking if I just get a cover of a mattress topper it would help with the ripple.....anyhow planning on calling amazon to see if anyone else has complained.
customer_reviews.author: melanie

customer_reviews.title: Best mattress I’ve bought so far
customer_reviews.text: Been waiting to give a review on this mattress to ensure I gave it a proper review. It’s been nothing but a blessing to my nights’ sleep. I’ve had it for about a year now, and with monthly rotations, I have yet to create a rut in the mattress. I primarily sleep alone and in the same spot, yet it still feels like I just opened it from the package. I believe in buying a new mattress every 5 years and I will more than likely buy this one again in another 4 years.
customer_reviews.author: mike may

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: You can seriously stop looking! This is the best mattress I have ever own! I was trying to duplicate the feel of those luxurious feeling hotel bed and I ordered this bed with the matching platform and it’s super quiet (no more squeaky box spring) and the bed feels so soft! I feel like I’m sleeping in a super expensive mattress! I will come back to update if anything changes but this bed is a total win! The box did come totally destroyed but it didn’t affect the mattress at all, thank goodness. Also, I’m only 5” so getting into the bed is a bit of a hop for me.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholics fam

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice mattress for the price; did not find it was soft as read in reviews. It is firm but not like a board and not soft as a pillow type. I like soft and my husband firm; he has not complained about his back hurting as much. It has held up so far to the weight of me, my hubby and a 160 pound English Mastiff. I will say so far so good just wish it had been a little softer. We have left the plastic it came in on the mattress and don't know if that is not as soft as I read in the reviews. T
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Fine but not great
customer_reviews.text: If I could put this mattress into one word it'd be ‘Fine’. Feels good when you first lay down but the longer you’re there, you become uncomfortable. I’ve been waking up with back pain but I think it is because this mattress is too soft. The bed holds A LOT of heat so if you’re a hot sleeper you should avoid this mattress. My husband and I have been waking up sweating in the middle of the night and unable to back to sleep. Also the mattress has indents from where we sleep and we haven’t owned it for a year yet.
customer_reviews.author: Alesia

customer_reviews.title: Literally the best sleep I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: This isn't even hyperbole; this mattress has given me quite literally the best sleep I've had in my life. I knew I had back pains some mornings worse than others, but I haven't had ANY back pains since getting this -- nearly a YEAR ago! I didn't have to "break it in" or anything, and it's in as pristine condition at the day I started using it. Fair warning; this thing is INCREDIBLY heavy, so not the easiest thing to move if you're thinking about changing bedrooms or anything! But I would buy a second one of these in a heartbeat. It really is the best money I've ever spent.
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical, but worth it
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think buying a cheap mattress on amazon would be something that I love so much. I've had the 12 inch hybrid since April and its now mid-july and it is still so comfortable and dreamy. I sleep so well with it. I didn't think I'd like a mattress this much ever without testing it out first. Hopefully it lasts!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I honestly dont remember what a bad night sleeps feels like anymore
customer_reviews.text: First time buying online but I did cheat and test my sister zinus out before buying it:) so amazing! Back pain gone! We got this mattress just in time for my wife's pregnancy and we sleep like babies now. Such an awesome buy. I've always had back pain waking up in the morning from an old back injury and crap mattress but thanks to our zinus that's completely gone. When we unboxed we let air out with an essential oil defuser close by in the living room for 5 days and smell was faint but noticable at first and was completely gone within a couple weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its the best.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this mattress 2 months ago and so far we love it. Not the full 14 inches thick thats advertised but close. I love a firm mattress while my wife loves a medium squishy one and this falls perfectly in the middle of what we want. A little difficult to move around cause the 121 lb advertised weight so definitely a 2 person move minimum. Amazing comfort and sleep quality and offers great support for my back whether I sleep on my side or back. For people shopping and comparing mattresses I would suggest buying it. Comes rolled up and vacuum sealed. Expands up in about a day and a half.
customer_reviews.author: butterfly_Starlight53

customer_reviews.title: Take your money elsewhere!
customer_reviews.text: 6 month review - this is the worst mattress I have ever used. My wife and I together weigh 320 lbs. and this mattress has become uneven within 6 months of use. The top layer has sort of collected at certain spots. Not to mention, it is smaller than a queen size frame, so it has deformed our pillows as well. Please do yourself a favor and take your money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Aditya B.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive feet due to peripheral neuropathy, so I need a mattress that’s plush enough to allow my feet to rest against it, while providing enough support to maintain a comfortable resting position. This product checks the boxes on both counts, at a fraction of the price of the leading hotel chain mattress (which shall remain nameless) that I was considering. The gel/coil combo seems to keep the mattress itself from overheating as well. The only downside is the plasticky stench — it took a lot more than 48 hours (as the manufacturer states) to dissipate, so unless you can leave it out for at least a week, it’s something you’ll have to get used to for a while.
customer_reviews.author: yafman

customer_reviews.title: The most uncomfortable mattress I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 12 inch mattress based on the product reviews. I've had this mattress for 3 months and I dread going to bed every night! It is rock hard...has no give..i wake up in the middle of the night with hip pain so bed I have to rub Ben gay on it to get relieve...it also hurts my lower back! I am in the process of buying a memory foam pad to see if that helps...I do not recommend this mattress to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Rafaela E.

customer_reviews.title: Painful. I wanted to like this.
customer_reviews.text: I was under the impression the hybrid would basically be like adding a memory foam topper to a spring mattress. Not so at all. I can't tell that this is memory foam, it's very firm and not at all comfortable. I've bought their memory foam mattresses and liked them but this thing is horrid. It seems very well made and looks great, but it doesnt do me any good if I cant sleep on it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve12345

customer_reviews.title: Good in Theory
customer_reviews.text: I loved this bed the first month we had it, but it broke down super fast. It's only been 3 months and we are ready to get rid of it. For $600 I was expecting much more. It's still comfortable, as long as I stay in my own little 'groove' on the bed, but if I try to move over even 6 inches, I'm rolling uphill on the bed. Very disappointing. Like I said, comfortable bed, but bad quality.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Olson

customer_reviews.title: Just go for it!
customer_reviews.text: I was very hesitant to buy a brand I had not heard of before but with the return policy being so generous I decided to try it. It is an amazing mattress. Paid 1/3 of what I would have paid in a store. My husband and I both suffer from back problems and likely o had been waking up sore and unable to walk straight. That is no longer the case! Love, love, love this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Tisha Groseclose

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable but the Smell.
customer_reviews.text: I have had it about one week. The smell is amazing, think damp cave with mushrooms. No fan or open window helps. Now the smell is about 50%, I take the sheets off everyday as Zinus suggests in other comments. Zinus says the smell isn’t unhealthy, maybe true but living downwind from a pig farm isn’t unhealthy either. I’m over 200 lbs and this is the most comfortable mattress I have had. Shame, I’m going to give it another week then decide. I wonder why some report no smell at all, did I get an old one or something?
customer_reviews.author: george

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about buying a bed in the box. I have a bad neck and back so I was really looking for a very firm bed. I didn't think a bed in a box could get very firm but this bed is the perfect firmness! I love it. It's super comfortable and has held it's shape. I allowed for mine to air out for 48 hours as instructed to be sure it fully expanded. I might just have to buy this for my other bedroom!
customer_reviews.author: Katlyn L.

customer_reviews.title: This mattress is so comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I’m really glad I bought this mattress! I researched and read tons of reviews and I settled on this one. I’ve bought other mattresses online and this is definitely my favorite. It is just right-not too soft or hard. It looks nice out of the package too. I’ve gotten good quality sleep on it and even woke up with less back and neck pain almost immediately. It came rolled up with not much packaging and became the the normal size within a day. The odor wasn’t too bad and went away fairly quickly. Plus, it’s a GREAT deal! I would order this again in a second!
customer_reviews.author: Karsh22

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress except for the SMELL
customer_reviews.text: I would love to give it 5 Stars due to the great delivery, ease of set up and most important mattress quality, but the SMELL is still evident after THREE weeks! It was so bad the first week, my wife and I slept in another room. We had two fans running 24/7 on high and sprayed fabreeze five days straight. Will update again, but its 3 weeks in and we slept on it the last two weeks very comfortably except for the smell
customer_reviews.author: George Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Know first if you want hard medium or plush
customer_reviews.text: The bed itself is superior quality... I wish it wasn't so hard tho! My husband and I slept on it for 2 nights and we're worse off than before...but it was just because it was so hard. I sent it back and they refunded my purchase no problem. Wonderful customer service! I gave 5 stars because I know this bed is good quality and will probably be comfortable for other people. Remember... not everything is for everybody!
customer_reviews.author: Kylee

customer_reviews.title: Nice mattress, Amazon customer service was excellent.
customer_reviews.text: The mattress is comfortable, but, when I opened the plastic it was wrapped in it smelled badly like mildew. The box it cache in was badly damaged and I believe the plastic shrink wrap got punctured allowing moisture to get into mattress causing the mildew. After letting it air out for more than a week the odor would not go away so I contacted Amazon and they immediately agreed to replace it without any hassle. I was VERY impressed with Amazon's customer service. They agreed to send people to remove the first mattress and bring the new one into the house. It was a pleasure dealing with them. The second mattress is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: RMC

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: There was a slight smell at first, but it did eventually dissipate after 4-5 days. A little longer than I expected. Just ensure you leave it uncovered (don't put any sheets on it during this time.) The mattress is pretty comfortable. The only reason it's not 5 stars is because the smell duration and the edges of the mattress has no real support. Be careful you dont sit on the edge for long periods of time. Seems like it would compromise those spots long term. Overall, the comfort and firmness was better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Sislee

customer_reviews.title: Good mattress if you like semi firm to firm
customer_reviews.text: I have been sleeping on the mattress for about a week now. It is comfortable for me. It does not need a box spring but if someone wants the bed higher it could work based on your bed. It is great quality and is not cheap looking at all. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Basic. very basic.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 12" Mattress. Came on time and once you rip off the plastic bag, the mattress opens up pretty fast. As far as 1) Sleep quality - very basic 2) Pain relief - Sometimes I wake up with some pain 3) Comfort - from 1 to 10, Ill give this mattress 5. You can get much better mattress from sleepys for that price. Even if need to spend $150 more, still worth it. Basic. very basic.
customer_reviews.author: MOTI

customer_reviews.title: Pretty awful!
customer_reviews.text: So uncomfortable!! My back and neck hurt every morning, my husband’s hips hurt, my mom slept on it one night and said she woke up with even her ribs hurting! We were unsure of how to actually return a queen size mattress to Amazon, so we have spent extra money buying TWO DIFFERENT mattress toppers! The first mattress topper wasn’t enough cushion. Luckily, with the second one on there, it is finally a sleepable bed.
customer_reviews.author: Charity

customer_reviews.title: The bed is nice but it smells like paint
customer_reviews.text: We haven't had any issues adjusting to this mattress. We left behind our old memory foam mattress for this hybrid and it's been a seamless transition. However, I can't stand to sleep on the bed because it smells like paint!! It's been 4 days and the smell is overwhelming. I am worried that I just spent all this money on a mattress that I won't be able to use. The company warned it might smell but only for like a day or two and it's been twice as long.
customer_reviews.author: Scruggs

customer_reviews.title: Best mattress ever!
customer_reviews.text: After the first night of sleep, the next day, woke up with no back pain. This unbelivable mattress firm but soft. Sounds redundent but that is the best way to describe the high comfort level this mattress provides. Once you open the wrapping it quickly transform into a wonderful mattress in a matter of seconds. You cannot tell the difference in the way it looks from the usual brands like Sealy, Certapedic and any other major brand. We will be ordering more for other family members. Looks stunning! (14 inch - Queen Sized firm that replaced a king)
customer_reviews.author: Debra Borowiec

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: We got this and replaced our 16 year old mattress. Sooooo happy with it. So comfy. My husband wanted something firm and I wanted a another pillow top. Although this is not a pillow top it has coils and I think that makes it a little more smooshy that a straight foam mattress. Would highly recommend and from now on will NOT be spending $1500 on a mattress like before!
customer_reviews.author: Missy Rae

customer_reviews.title: 1 year in, very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The product was great to start with, firm and supportive, with a coziness to it. A lil too firm for the wife at first but perfect for me. 6 months in we started noticing a lack of support and increased back pain. We regularly rotated the bed to try and minimize the sagging and let memory foam refresh but one year in, I’m really disappointed and may have to buy yet another mattress. I’m 5’11” and right at 200 pounds and my wife is 5’9” and 140 to 170 pounds. I can’t recommend this mattress. I was hoping to make it 3 to 4 years but I doubt it will make it two now.
customer_reviews.author: Santa Claus

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I am 26 and have had back pain from mattresses for as long as I can remember. I was going to purchase a plain memory foam one but saw that the hybrids give better support. I’ve had this for a month and it is extremely comfortable! I sleep alone so I know I will need to turn it to ensure it wears evenly, but that’s not a hassle to me. I think this was a good purchase and I had no issues getting it unwrapped on my own. It is very heavy, but if you can get it straight from the box to the frame it’s easiest.
customer_reviews.author: kendra

customer_reviews.title: Nice but the smell
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the mattress and says it’s so comfortable to sleep in. It’s not rock hard but firm and not saggy. Perfect height for platform bed if you don’t want to be too low, imho. Only problem for me was the strong chemical odor. This isn’t my first purchase of a compressed, mail order mattress but it’s the first time getting one that the smell is way strong. My daughter says it doesn’t bother her but it took weeks to get the smell out of the house!
customer_reviews.author: AHG

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just received bed last week. Gave it 72 hours to "air out" and take the shape a regular mattress should be. Mattress still has weird smell and a huge jump in the middle. Cannot sleep on it, this is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Soft and hot and not for me. (12" thick)
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 12 inch thick mattress and after sleeping on it for about 3 weeks, I'm returning it. It's too soft for me and has caused me to have slight back and hip pain in when I wake up. That being said, I've slept on an extremely firm mattress all my life. My real issue with this mattress is that it's incredibly hot. It's so hot that to stay cool I've been sleeping with the windows open, and it snowed across town last night. Even then, whichever side of my body that's on the mattress stays hot and the side that isn't freezes. So I've been tossing and turning since I got the mattress trying to find some equilibrium.
customer_reviews.author: Briggs Family

customer_reviews.title: Happy, happy!!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a softer mattress and this fits the bill. I liked it immediately: seems to offer just the right support with a bit of give. I’ve slept on it for about three weeks and couldn’t be happier. It fluffed up fully within about four hours, has absolutely no chemical odor, and fits the bed perfectly. It does not seem to be overheating me at all, which is another strong plus. It took me months to decide on a mattress and thus far this has been a great choice. Price is unbeatable!!!
customer_reviews.author: Linney

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I treated ourselves to a new mattress (finally)! I spent days researching and chose this Zinus mattress after trying a similar one out at a family members house. It’s solid, sturdy yet comfortable. We wake up with zero back pain (back pain use to be a daily issue) and sleep solid. The best part is being able to move around without disturbing the other person, you can hardly tell when someone gets on or off the bed! We are both very pleased with this mattress!
customer_reviews.author: MoFam6

customer_reviews.title: 12 Inch Too Firm
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 12in thinking it would be a good comfort level but boy was I wrong. The 12in is what I would consider firm at a mattress store. Should've bought the 14in. I've been able to sleep on my side a little, but not on my back. Wake up with a sore back close to every morning. I didn't have a chemical smell at all, so I am happy there. Overall I was mostly happy with it, but will just need to buy a foam cushion to go on top for that extra level of comfort. For under $1000, you really can't expect much so you get what you pay for here.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy a "Purple" or a Casper or any other over-hyped over-priced mattress!
customer_reviews.text: I spent a month in analysis paralysis after reading too many BS blogs that recommend one of the more advertised brands over the either. This hybrid mattress is the most comfortable I have ever owned, and I have owned one traditional and two memory - foams in my lifetime. Save a grand and go this route. I won't be making any statements concerning comfort, firmness, etc. due to the simple fact that all of those recommendations are completely subjective. No person can tell someone else that a mattress is firm or soft or comfortable...that is called qualitative data and it is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Carlile

customer_reviews.title: The Chemical Smell is Awful
customer_reviews.text: We let the mattress off-gas for a week in a well-ventilated room with a fan running. The smell permeated my whole house. We finally called Amazon to return it and was told “it was a known issue” with this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Halstead

customer_reviews.title: Day 1: initial sleep; Status: fully rested, no back pain
customer_reviews.text: Only one night on the mattress but it was good quality sleep. My partner usually complains of back pain but woke up the next morning stating she sleep throughout the night. We did put a pillow top on for just a little more cushion. If I remember I will post another review in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Dora the sexual explorer

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this mattress to replace a 10 year old Stearns & Foster mattress that cost about 6x as much. The box was a bit beat up when it arrived, which is somewhat understandable because this thing is heavy. Definitely need 2 people to move a King Size around if you don't want to just drag it. No odor when we unwrapped it. Opened it up on Thursday around noon and slept on it Friday night and it was very comfortable. We are 4 nights in at this point and very happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: joshf128

customer_reviews.title: Very nice mattress
customer_reviews.text: I love this mattress over any I've ever owned ... Many days I wake up and don't even realize my spouse has gotten out of the bed ... I sleep in all positions and all are very comfortable ... I had no odd or weird smells ... It fluffed up really quickly after unboxing ... The packaging looked like it had been around the world twice, but the mattress was so well wrapped and protected there was no damage ...
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Stuckey

customer_reviews.title: Not too soft, not too firm. Perfect for us
customer_reviews.text: This bed is not too soft not too firm. I am pleasantly surprised how nice it is for the price! I paid a lot more for a mattress that isn’t half this nice. My husband has some pain in his back. He wasn’t sleeping well with our old one. He sleeps through the night a lot better and says it’s 100 percent better for his back. One thing however. This bed is heavy! So you will need a couple of hands to remove from box and eventually to the bed if you’re not a strong person! I hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Serena t.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Well made and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a 5'7 teen whose quite curvy. Its perfect even in a twin size. Thick, firm but soft. Im extremely pleased with the quality for the price I paid!!! Fits reg twin sheets. This mattress is part springs part foam I believe and its absolutely worth it. I wish I had one now!! I only paid 123.00 what a steal!! Came delivered in a large box that I put on the frame before unwrapping. Its a lot heavier duty than I thought. But thats great!! Love it! Shes comfy and my wallet is happy
customer_reviews.author: Karliepie

customer_reviews.title: Needed a new bed, wasn't willing to spend a lot of money
customer_reviews.text: I was not nor had I ever been sold on memory foam or any type of hybrid mattress. It arrived and I let it breathe out of that box like it said to. It said to let it expand 24 to 48 hours. I made it to around 36 because my old spring bed had springs coming through both sides. No smell as the other posts mention by the way, but anyway. I'm so completely shocked by this mattress that I don't ever want another regular spring mattress. Very very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt Bryson

customer_reviews.title: Side sleepers rejoice!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my new mattress! Been sleeping on it for 3 weeks. Love the quality of the mattress. It is definitely FIRM, but doesn't cause aches in my side. The hardest adjustment has been in my shoulders and upper back, but I'm sleeping better with less tossing and turning at night. If you are a side sleeper definitely get the 14 inch mattress, any more firm and this would be hell (the smaller the number, the more firm). I also bought my bed from Zinus 3 years ago and it is holding up very well. Overall extremely happy with the quality of these products. Also, there is not a strong "memory foam odor" either!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Back pain.
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t the mattress I wanted. My husband bought this because of the reviews. We’ve had it almost a month and my lower back Is constantly in pain. I lay on a heating pad everyday just to take the pain away. My husband said this bed is okay. Which means he doesn’t like it either. It is very firm. Going to try and return it. The one thing I loved about it, it expanded quickly, within 3-4 hours.
customer_reviews.author: akremington12

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: this is our 3rd mattress from Zinus, each different all Fabulous, lower back pain has subsided and a great night's sleep is had by all. Hubby hasn't complained once since getting this mattress even his snoring has subsided...Mahalo Zinus & Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Zinus 14 Inch Gel-Infused Memory Foam Hybrid Mattress
customer_reviews.text: Since my old mattress was getting old, waking up with an aching back was happening too often. I was skeptical of buying a mattress from a box without feeling it or testing it. I wanted something firm to help with back pain/discomfort. I am glad I read a few reviews and took a chance on it! My husband said, if you don't like it; we can put it in the guest room. So, we bought it. I have been sleeping great and have waken up without any back issues. Love, love the firmness! The reviews mentioned some sort of smell. I am lucky, because I didn't smell anything. So far, this has been the best investment for this year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Zinus 12 Inch Gel Memory Foam Pocket Spring Hybrid Mattress / Pocket Innersprings for Motion Isolation / Cooling Foam / Edge Support, Queen
product_meta.description: Size:Queen| Style:12 Inch| Pattern Name:MattressThe soft memory foam and revolutionary iCoil pocket springs of our Gel Memory Foam Hybrid Mattress are just what you need to inspire restorative sleep. Equipped with all the bells and whistles you could want in a mattress, it begins with layers of top quality CertiPUR US certified comfort and gel-infused memory foams, which ensure that your body is not only perfectly contoured, but also perfectly cool throughout the night. Thermoregulating gel helps draw heat away from the body, keeping your temperature in the ideal zone for sound and peaceful sleep. And that’s not all. A base layer of supportive pocket innersprings ensures durability as well as motion isolation, meaning you remain undisturbed even if your partner or pets have more ‘active’ sleep habits. And for those that do like to move around at night, this mattress has you covered with its superior edge support, designed to make sitting on and staying in bed that much easier. We could go on and on about everything from its premium quilted cover with convenient handles to its included 10 year worry-free warranty, but instead, let’s just say that this one’s got everything you need to put your sleep woes to bed once and for all.
feature_bullets: COOL, CALM & COMFY - This mattress delivers the 3 C’s of sleep, even if your partner likes to practice their dance moves in bed; our cooling foam and pocketed innersprings keep away body heat and motion from a sleeping partner, for sleep that’s no sweat

CONFORMING FOAM & POCKET SPRINGS - 1.25 inches soft comfort foam, 1.5 inches cooling Fusion gel memory foam, 1.25 inch responsive ViscoLatex foam, and 7.5 inch motion-isolating iCoil pocket springs; ideal for back, stomach and average weight to plus-sized sleepers
CERTIPUR US CERTIFIED - Highest quality foam is CertiPUR US Certified for durability, performance, and content

EXPERTLY PACKAGED - Our technology allows this mattress to be efficiently compressed into one box that’s easily shipped and maneuvered into the bedroom; simply unbox, unroll and this mattress does the rest, expanding to its original shape within 72 hours
Worry-free 10 year limited warranty included; twin mattress supports a maximum weight of 250 lbs, while all other sizes can support up to 500 lbs

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars2,768 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
